Class WordParser

  • public class WordParser
extends java.lang.Object
    The word parsing controller.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Giacomo Marciani
    See Also:
    App, GrammarAnalyzer, GrammarTransformer

    • Method Detail

      • getInstance

        public static WordParser getInstance()
        Returns the word parser controller singleton instance.
        Returns:
        the controller singleton instance.

      • parse

        public static boolean parse(Grammar grammar,
            java.lang.String word,
            ParserType parser)
        Parses the specified word by the specified parser, according to the specified grammar.
        Parameters:
        grammar - the grammar to parse according to.
        word - the word to parse.
        parser - parser class: can be Cock-Younger-Kasami, or LR(1).
        Returns:
        true, if the word can be parsed by the parser according to the grammar; false, otherwise.

      • parseCYK

        public static boolean parseCYK(Grammar grammar,
               java.lang.String word)
        Parses the specified word by the Cock-Younger-Kasami parser, according to the specified grammar.
        Parameters:
        grammar - the grammar to parse according to.
        word - the word to parse.
        Returns:
        true, if the word can be parsed by the Cock-Younger-Kasami parser, according to the grammar; false, otherwise.

      • parseLROne

        public static boolean parseLROne(Grammar grammar,
                 java.lang.String word)
        Parses the specified word by the LR(1) parser, according to the specified grammar.
        Parameters:
        grammar - the grammar to parse according to.
        word - word the word to parse.
        Returns:
        true, if the word can be parsed by the LR(1) parser, according to the grammar; false, otherwise.
